intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: This place is so beautiful...so calming.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Isn't it? This is Izumo. It is known as the kingdom of the gods. Even as outside kingdoms quarrel, it remains neutral and peaceful.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: So this is the beauty that peace allows for... How inspiring. If this place is neutral, perhaps we should rest here for a while. Everyone must be exhausted after all our many travels and battles.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Agreed. We might be able to gather some useful information here too. The area surrounding the Hoshidan capital is heavily guarded. As of now, we have no good options for getting there safely. Perhaps someone here know something that could help. Then it's settled. Let's go!

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Hello there! Greetings and salutations! You've traveled far, haven't you? You have! Welcome to my not-so-humble abode, Nohrian friends!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you very much for the...erm, warm welcome.

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: My castle here is a teeny tiny bitty baby, but please make yourselves at home.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: We, um, will do that. But...may I ask who I have the pleasure of addressing right now?

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Oh! OH! Silly me! Yes, allow me to introduce myself. I am Archduke Izana, first heir to the divine bloodline, descendant of the gods...keeper of prophecies, and winner of best hair six times running. Not to brag. It's so nice to meet you!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Y-you're an archduke?! Really? ...Really, though?

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: Impossible. He's so disgustingly casual...

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: I'm a little surprised he's able to lead a whole kingdom like that...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: It's downright unsettling...

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Hi, Izana!! It's great to meet you too! Let's be best friends, heehee!

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Ooh! Aren't you the cutest little girl this side of the Bottomless Canyon! You are my new favorite, Lady Elise!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Hm? Um, did I already introduce myself? I know I'm forgetful, but...

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Ah ha ha... Ehem. Right. Don't be a goose, milady. You are all part of the Nohrian royal family. I know all of your names! It's only fitting for an archduke such as myself.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Oh, that makes total sense!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Hmm...

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: I must say, you royals have the most exquisite of exquisite timing. Tonight I am hosting a banquet fit for lovely little royal types like you! I already have the most TO DIE FOR guest list. You'll die! You simply MUST attend. You must! You will, yes? Will you? Won't you?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Guest? Who might they be?

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Yes! It's hard to believe, but you're not the only royals I've collected today. I also have the honor of hosting the Hoshidan royal family!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What?!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Corrin?! Is that r-really you?

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: Corrin! What are you doing here?!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Corrin... How unexpected.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: H-hello...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Stay back, Corrin! Those people are dangerous. They will stop at nothing to steal you away from us.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Ha. Nohrian logic at its finest. Don't forget who stole our brother/sister first.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Speak ill of Nohrians again, and so help me...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Why are you angry? It's not an insult if it's true.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You really desire to feel my blade at your throat don't you?

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Just try it! I dare you!

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Whoa! No, no, no! Stop this at once! You don't want to be held responsible for breaking Izumo's neutrality pact, right? Put those awful swords away THIS INSTANT.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: What pact?

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Our lovely little Izumo has a strict pact that prohibits fighting of any kind. Even princes like you would be severely punished if you broke said pact. So let's all just put those nasty weapons away and enjoy supper! That's an order.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: ...Fine. As a fellow ruler, I will respect your laws.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: I may stay my blade, but don't expect me to let my guard down. I don't need a weapon to kill you, should the need arise.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You wish to engage me in hand-to-hand combat? That can be arranged...

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Heh heh...ehem. Now, now, silly princes. Enough of this combat talk. So boring! You may be at war, but as long as you're under my roof, you'll play by my rules. They're such fun rules too! We'll start by locking away those weapons of yours. Now, our bountiful banquet is still cooking, so enjoy our amenities in the meantime.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Hmph.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Well, that was unexpected. How are you holding up?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: OK, I guess. I'm so sorry about all this, Xander.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Not everything in the world is your fault, little prince/princess. We're here because you're a good leader who wished to give us a safe place to rest. None among us would even consider blaming you for what's happening.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you, Brother...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Hello, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Ryoma?!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: What do you want, Hoshidan?

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Please, calm yourselves. I mean no harm to either of you. I simply wish to speak with my brother/sister.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: So that you can steal him/her away to Hoshido the first chance you get? I won't allow it.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Watch that temper of yours, Nohrian prince. I admit I acted out of line earlier, but I will not stoop to violating Izumo's peace pact. As high prince of Hoshido. I don't have the luxury of making such a political misstep.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: ...As crown prince of Nohr, I am bound by the same political constraints. If you and yours can behave amicably then so can we.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hmm...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Is something on your mind, Corrin?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's just...despite your differences, the two of you are quite similar in some ways.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Corrin! There's no need to insult me like that. I could not possibly be anything like this sorry excuse for a prince.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: For once, I agree with Prince Xander. To start, I'm far more attractive.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Beg pardon?!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Whoa! Easy there! Don't fight now—we just started getting along! And I wasn't talking about your looks. Maybe it's because you're both heir to your respective thrones... But the dignified way you carry yourselves...how you care so deeply for your kingdom... I just think deep down, you two are more alike than you may think.

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: There he is! The high prince of Hoshido! Get him!!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Nohrian soldiers? What is the meaning of this?!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: How dare you act against our orders!

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Ignore those party poopers, soldiers. Capture Prince Ryoma! Do it now!!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: What the... Unhand me!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: As crown prince of Nohr, I demand you to stop this at once! What are you playing at, Izana? I thought all violence was forbidden here.

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: Heh heh, that's the best part. I...am not Izana.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: What?!

intro.speaker: Zola
intro.line: Eeheehee! It's been a long time, Lord Xander.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Zola!

intro.speaker: Zola
intro.line: Phew! It feels SO GOOD to finally be myself again! It was hard pretending to be that twit of an archduke with the Hoshidan royals around.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Where is the real Archduke Izana? What have you done with him?!

intro.speaker: Zola
intro.line: Eeheehee, I'm afraid he and his ridiculous hair have been locked away a long while. He'll no doubt enjoy the company of Prince Ryoma in that ungodly cell. Oh! Let's not forget the other Hoshidan royals. Sweet death awaits all of them! I wonder if the littlest one will c-c-cry when her time comes...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You monster! Do you really mean to kill them? Even the youngest ones?!

intro.speaker: Zola
intro.line: But of course! King Garon will be so proud when I tell him of my triumph! When I heard the Hoshidan royals were attending a royal banquet in Izumo... I used my incomparable illusive magic to take the archduke's place. Genius, no? Then it was only a matter of time until the Hoshidans crawled into my web, hyo-ho.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: That's despicable, even for you.

intro.speaker: Zola
intro.line: No more flattery, please! I'll blush! Now we can capture Hoshido once and for all. I bet the king will grant me a new title! If you'll excuse me, I have some very important death sentencing to do.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Zola, halt! ZOLA!!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander... Wh-what are we going to do?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Don't worry, Corrin. I won't allow this treachery to go unpunished. Hoshido may be our enemy, but to murder its royals while they are unarmed... I won't have us win the war this way. We will win with honor or die trying. Come, Brother/Sister. Let us go set free our sworn enemy.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm with you all the way, Xander. You really are my hero. I hope you know. ...Heh heh.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Was that a guffaw I heard? Out with it, little prince/princess. What's so funny?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Heh, sorry... It's just that you and Ryoma really are so much alike. If you weren't on opposite sides of a war, I think you could have been great friends.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Yeesh... Do me a favor and keep that nonsense in your head where it belongs. Now, to the task at hand. Gather our troops and prepare for battle. Zola isn't one to postpone violence. We haven't much time.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm on it!

boss.speaker: Zola
boss.line: Why are you fighting this?! I am not you're enemy, those Hoshidans are! I act only for the glory of Nohr! Why is this happening? WHY?!
